title: Order bodged?
content:
I is it just me, or should posts on this forum be arranged by 'last comment' date, which doesn't seem to be happenning?

edit: never mind, it seems to have fixed itself now.

title: Re: Order bodged?
content:
What must of happened was you didn't log in.

When you are not logged in EzBoard displays posts from date created... not most recently posted in.

So when you logged in it "fixed" its self.

Ez is stupid that way.-----------------------
The end of this post. You may stop reading now.
